text: Aquarius is the eleventh astrological sign of the Zodiac. The name is from the constellation Aquarius. It is an air sign. It is ruled by Uranus (in modern astrology) and Saturn (in ancient astrology). It was based on the Sumerian god Enki, the god of water who was often drawn pouring water. ==References== Category:Western astrological signs
title: Aquarius (astrology)
